Uses of Class
apryraz.tworld.AMessage

  • Uses of AMessage in apryraz.tworld

    Methods in apryraz.tworld that return AMessage
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AMessage
    TreasureWorldEnv.acceptMessage(AMessage msg)
    Process a message received by the TFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer This version only process answers to moveto and detectsat messages
    AMessage
    TreasureFinder.DetectsAt()
    Send to the environment object the question: "Does the detector sense something around(agentX,agentY) ?"
    AMessage
    TreasureFinder.moveTo(int x, int y)
    Use agent "actuators" to move to (x,y) We simulate this why telling to the World Agent (environment) that we want to move, but we need the answer from it to be sure that the movement was made with success
    AMessage
    TreasureFinder.moveToNext()
    Ask the agent to move to the next position, by sending an appropriate message to the environment object.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AMessage
    TreasureWorldEnv.acceptMessage(AMessage msg)
    Process a message received by the TFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer This version only process answers to moveto and detectsat messages
    void
    TreasureFinder.processDetectorSensorAnswer(AMessage ans)
    Process the answer obtained for the query "Detects at (x,y)?"
    void
    TreasureFinder.processMoveAnswer(AMessage moveans)
    Process the answer obtained from the environment when we asked to perform a movement
